titles: Papists protesting against Protestant-popery in answer to a discourse entituled, A papist not mis-represented by Protestants : being a vindication of The papist mis-represented and represented, and the reflections upon the answer.

notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
